content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Dear Resource Manager!\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Beyond salary, psychological and social fulfillment can determine which employees are motivated to stay, perform, and contribute to organization success. Companies that nail employee engagement understand that motivating high performance and aligning talent with business strategy requires getting to the heart of what matters to employees.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Why Does It Matter? \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The satisfaction and engagement of our employees should be one of our primary concerns as a leader. When employees are engaged in their work, it can directly impact the bottom line. Thousands of organizations around the world invest into employee engagement programs every year. Top-performing organizations know that employee engagement drives business outcomes. Business leaders have long recognized that attracting and retaining top talent is critical for organizational success. A highly engaged workplace adapts quicker, grows faster and innovates more.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What is employee engagement & experience?\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employee engagement\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": employees state when they feel aligned with the company & self-driven to reach the company's goals and successes (due to the company's efforts).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Engaged employees are involved in, enthusiastic about, and committed to their work and workplace, and have a strong sense of emotional well-being.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employee engagement, in essence, is the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"outcome\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" of all work factors that an individual \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"experiences\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" day-to-day.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employee experience\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is the journey employees take with their organization. It includes every day-to-day interaction that happens along the employee life cycle, plus the experiences that involve an employee's role, workspace, managers, wellbeing, etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employee engagement and experiences are \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"closely connected\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": high level of employee engagement can result from the positive employee experience (and vice versa).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Why are employee engagement and experience important?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Working with and investing in positive employee experience is crucial to creating an engaged workforce who wants to stay with an organization, is ready for discretionary efforts, and is proud of their organization.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In those companies \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"where employee engagement is high, customer engagement, profitability, productivity is also significantly higher\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" compared to low-engagement organizations (Gallup Q12 Meta-Analysis, 2020.). Companies that invest in employee experience are 4x more profitable than those that do not (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.qualtrics.com/uk/experience-management/employee/employee-experience/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Qualtrics\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\").\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At EPAM we study intensively both the employee engagement and the employee experience by means of global People survey and Pulse.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"People survey.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The People Survey is a regular confidential engagement questionnaire which is sent out EPAMers by e-mail globally. It helps to measure engagement/loyalty, to check the company status, to find issues to be fixed.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employee engagement is
